motion.name: Speed
motion.description: Velocity equals distance divided by time

motion.name: Acceleration
motion.description: Acceleration equals the change in velocity over time

energy.name: Potential Energy
energy.description: Potential energy equals mass times the acceleration due to gravity times height

energy.name: Kinetic Energy
energy.description: Kinetic energy equals one-half times mass times the square of the velocity

thermodynamics.name: Ideal Gas Law
thermodynamics.description: The Ideal Gas Law relates the pressure, volume, and temperature of a gas.

optics.name: Snell's Law
optics.description: Snell's Law describes the relationship between the angles of incidence and refraction when light passes through the boundary between two different isotropic media.

variables.n₁: Refractive index of the first medium
variables.n₂: Refractive index of the second medium
